WUA to Area in Square Meters

Source: R/utils.R
wua_to_area.Rd

Function converts a Weighted Usable Area (WUA) to an area in square meters by multiplying the WUA by the stream's length used by the species. The lengths were obtained through expert outreach in 2017 and are available here watershed_lengths.

wua_to_area(wua, watershed_name, life_stage, species_name)

Arguments

wua

WUA in square feet per 1000 feet
life_stage

life stage
watershed

watershed
species

species, "fr" - fall run or "sr" - spring run or "st" - steel head

Contents

Developed by Sadie Gill, Emanuel Rodriguez, Mark Tompkins.
